member.name: P:Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility.Platform.iOS.NativeViewWrapperRenderer.ManageNativeControlLifetime
member.summary: The native control we're wrapping isn't ours to dispose of

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility.Platform.iOS.TabbedRenderer.GetIcon(Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Page)
member.summary: Get the icon for the tab bar item of this page
member.returns: A tuple containing as item1: the unselected version of the icon, item2: the selected version of the icon (item2 can be null), or null if no icon should be set.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility.Platform.iOS.ViewRenderer`2.ManageNativeControlLifetime
member.summary: Determines whether the native control is disposed of when this renderer is disposed Can be overridden in deriving classes
